title: Shopping: Stores (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Stores subcategory within Shopping. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.english: Dais. has recently started to offer better quality products that cost more than 100 yen.
cards.romaji: Dais wa saikin, yori shitsuno takai sh hin o hyaku en ij no nedan de urihajime mashita.
cards.japanese: ダイソーは最近、より質の高い商品を百円以上の値段で売り始めました。

cards.english: Matsumoto Kiyoshi stores are found in 44 out of 47 prefectures in Japan.
cards.romaji: Matsumoto Kiyoshi wa, nihon no zen yonj.nana tod fuken no uchi yonj.yon tod fuken ni shinshutsu shiteimasu.
cards.japanese: マツモトキヨシは、日本の全四十七都道府県のうち四十四都道府県に進出しています。

cards.english: 7-Eleven has the highest number of convenience stores in Japan, with over 14,000 stores.
cards.romaji: Sebun irebun wa, ichiman yonsenten ij no mise o kamaeru, nihon de ichiban tempos. no i kombini desu.
cards.japanese: セブンイレブンは、一万四千店以上の店を構える、日本で一番店舗数の多いコンビニです。

cards.english: Tsutaya also sells second-hand CDs, DVDs, books and video games.
cards.romaji: Tsutaya dewa, ch.ko no sh.d. ya d.buid., hon, g.mu o kaukoto mo dekimasu.
cards.japanese: ツタヤでは、中古のCDやDVD、本、ゲームを買うこともできます。
